Description:
Comfort and Convenience in Craigieburn
Presenting an exciting opportunity for young families and first home buyers to enter the growing suburb of Craigieburn, this exceptional single level home offers an easy-care lifestyle close to amenities, expansive parklands and everything Craigieburn has to offer.
This well-appointed home offers:
- Two generously sized bedrooms
- Central tiled bathroom with shower over bath
- Private ensuite adjoining the light-filled master bedroom
- Sizeable open plan living/kitchen/dining enjoying an abundance of natural light and easy access to the rear yard
- L-shaped kitchen with quality appliances, tiled splashback and plenty of storage space
- Spacious rear yard, perfect for those with young children and pets
- Single car garage with internal access
- Split system heating and cooling providing comfort in every season
The location is ideal, with the expansive Malcolm Creek Parklands hosting a plethora of playgrounds and walking trails, along with Newbury Primary School, Mount Ridley College, Highlands Shopping Centre and Craigieburn Central just a short distance away. This location has everything young families need to grow and thrive.
Insights: 13 Bluebell Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 39 other 2 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Affordable First Home/Investment
Looking for downsizing, investment property or you are on low budget then this is the one for you.
Perfectly located in the popular Craigieburn close to all schools, and transport.
Consists of 2 bedrooms with built in robes plus small study, functional kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, and an island bench, family room, living room all in one, small low maintenance backyard, single lock up garage. Split heating and cooling.
Everyone can afford it please call for special price and private appointment.

Description:
Perfect Family Living in the Heart of Waratah
Ideally positioned in a thriving Mickleham neighbourhood with Village Green parkland at the end of the street, this exceptional Carlisle-built 4 bedroom residence is sure to exceed all expectations with its intelligent design, quality upgrades & sizeable land component.
With an emphasis on quality & efficiency, the home's impressive interior showcases an extra-
large master bedroom with private dressing room & stylish ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with walk-in robes), main family bathroom & guest powder room (third WC).
Along with a dedicated study/home office, the home also includes a separate lounge,
rumpus/retreat (upstairs) & expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a superb
stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances, integrated microwave oven,
dishwasher & large walk-in pantry.
Zoned ducted heating & refrigerated cooling add to the appeal, as well as 3-phase power,
10kW solar power system, alarm, efficient LED lighting, integrated speakers, large laundry & excellent storage options across both levels. Step outside to an al-fresco entertaining area & substantial backyard garden, plus the added advantage of an oversized double garage (remote-control) with internal entry.
Also close to the area's recreational facilities & community centre, it will also offer easy access to the future schools, retail and dining precincts as well as the Hume Freeway & Donnybrook Station.
Insights: 12 Northall Road, Mickleham VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 172 other 4 bedroom house in Mickleham have recently been sold.

Description:
We challenge you to find a better buy!
This modern as new 2 year old (approx.) home has all the space and comfort many would expect to find in a much higher price bracket. With local schools, parks, shops and bus route all close by, its contemporary design will have every savvy purchaser wanting to make it theirs. It's wide inviting entrance and hallway passes by a handy study nook area whilst leading through to a separate lounge and opening up perfectly to the stylish kitchen with dishwasher and with large walk in pantry and overlooking the expansive family living and meals areas that also flow perfectly out to the relaxed outdoor undercover BBQ area. The free flowing single level design enjoys 4 good size bedrooms, central bathroom and main bedroom with ensuite with massive walk in robe/dressing room. Jam packed with features its highlights include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, vacuum maid and an oversized remote double garage with secure direct internal access and drive through roller door. Best value home on the market so be quick to inspect and register your interest.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy
In the family-focused Fairways Estate and located within easy reach of all amenities, this beautiful home presents a ready-made lifestyle of size & versatility with its functional floorplan & comfortable block of land.
For buyers that appreciate space, light & functionality the home enjoys a free-flowing design which highlights formal lounge/home theatre, 4 bedrooms all with built in robes (ensuite to master & a MASSIVE walk in robe), kitchen with 900mm SS appliances plus dishwasher, ample bench & cupboard space overlooking an adjoining meals continuing seamlessly through to the family area.
Adding to the properties appeal is a wonderfully large pergola perfect for entertaining, single car garage with drive-thru access, double drive-way with side gate access, low maintenance landscaped gardens with outdoor gazebo plus a garden shed, ducted heating, split system cooling, quality window furnishings, security alarm, CCTV, outdoor spa & so much more!
Situated to please, close to parkland, schools, shops & public transport. If family space, comfort & location are high on your agenda, then this home is a must inspect!

Description:
Quality With The Location To Match.
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Comprising of heating & cooling, kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, meals area/family area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, floor boards, quality window furnishings, upstairs study, remote control single lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with alfresco area & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates (Aston) & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
A Lifestyle of Impressive Prestige
This attractive 3 levels modern style residence set on a generous allotment offers panoramic city & lake views. With a touch of style, character and class for the astute purchaser that loves to entertain.
Offering: grand entrance foyer, beautiful staircase, formal lounge room, formal dining room, open plan family room with jet master log gas heater adjoining meals area leading to a large balcony, huge modern kitchen with granite bench tops and first class European appliances, second kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, 4 excellent size bedrooms all with BIR's, master bedroom with retreat area, a royal ensuite with spa bath, WIR, large balcony with city & lake views. Good size retreat/games room leading to balcony with lake view, 2 studies, large rumpus/gym room with separate bathroom, roomy laundry, central bathroom, powder room, undercover outdoor entertaining area, double remote garage with rear & internal access, all set in premier location.
Quality features include; high ceilings, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, jet master gas log heater, alarm system, vacuum maid, window furnishings, 3 balconies and the list goes on...
Inspection highly recommended!

Description:
Contemporary Masterpiece in Craigieburn's Best Spot
Situated in close proximity with everything Craigieburn has to offer, this ultramodern unit accommodates living perfection at the best location.
As you enter, a generously sized study sits on the ground floor that also presents fully secure parking in your garage, storage space, laundry facilities and outdoor area.
A beautiful and spacious living room rests on the second floor combined with a bespoke kitchen with complete stainless-steel appliances (dishwasher & oven). A huge balcony and a toilet are also at your convenience.
After a long day, relax in the two ample sized bedrooms, both with walk-in-robes and a sleek en-suite available. This fine piece of modern elegance is also close to exciting amenities such as:
- A few steps away from Craigieburn Central, a shopping mall which hosts plenty of restaurants and over 100 speciality stores to cover your fashion, health and beauty, lifestyle, entertainment, homewares and service needs.
- Walking distance to bus stops,
- Close to sporting destinations such as Splash Aqua Park and Leisure Centre and Craigieburn Public Golf Course
Don't miss this amazing opportunity!
Please bring your proof of identification when attending our open for inspection.
Please contact the agent to organise a private inspection.

Description:
Just Move In!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 16 Zeal Way Craigieburn. Situated in the ever popular Aston Estate, this brand new property is the ideal first home buyers and keen investors.
Upon entry you are greeted with a light filled open living, dining and gleaming kitchen with stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher.
Upstairs showcases a spacious master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, two additional bedrooms with built in robe serviced by a delightful central bathroom with bath.
Quality extras include heating, cooling, intercom, blinds, downstairs powder room, single car remote control garage and much more.
With the FHOG (First Home Owners Grant) available, take advantage and make this your first home!
Insights: 16 Zeal Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
âLOCATION, MODERN & 4 BEDROOMS + STUDY”
Location, quality of life and prestige come together in this luxurious home in undoubtedly
one of the best positions in Craigieburn within walking distance to the proposed shopping centre, golf course, transport and more.
Comprising of:
- Grand entrance hallway
- Formal lounge room
- Dream size fully equipped kitchen with stone bench tops, huge walk in pantry, dishwasher & 900mm quality s/s appliances
- Adjoining meals area overlooking large family room
- Separate theater/rumpus room
- Sunroom/entertaining are
- 4 excellent sized bedrooms all with built in robes & main with ensuite & WIR
- Study
- double garage with internal access
- drive trough access to the back
- All of this set on a large corner allotment
Fixtures & fittings include: fixed floor coverings, quality electric light fittings, window furnishings, zoned refrigerated cooling & ducted heating plus much more.
For inspections please call Romeo Sassine 0411 882 605.

Description:
Fully-Optioned & Ready to Relish!
In a family-focused quiet neighbourhood this distinctive 3 bedroom residence combines an exceptional 27sq floor plan with impressive inclusions to deliver a ready-made environment of quality, convenience & versatile style.
Beyond the impressive resort style facade, discover an immaculate & cleverly zoned interior showcasing a huge master bedroom with walk-in robe & private dual vanity ensuite, 2 large additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes) & main family bathroom. Add to this a separate formal lounge & spacious open-plan living/dining area with lush garden views from every window served by a well- appointed kitchen with 900mm cooking appliances, stone benchtops, dishwasher & deep pantry.
Other stand-out features include ducted heating & powerful split system cooling for all seasons comfort, high-ceilings, a comprehensive security system (alarm CCTV & video intercom), a double remote garage with internal and rear roller door access, family sized laundry with added storage & so much more!
Step outside & be greeted by a wonderful backyard garden with established trees & high hedged screening for added privacy, it also features automated watering system for the garden beds & if that's not enough, add to this an al-fresco entertaining area with quality Merbau decking, pull down blind, built in BBQ & a sense of relief that all the money has been spent on absolutely everything.
All this in a blue ribbon location, within a stone's throw to all of Craigieburn amenities, walking distance to a number of parks including Cross Keys Reserve, Thorngrove Reserve, Watermill Reserve, Malcolm Creek parkland & endless trails. A short walk to public transport, Highlands Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Central as well as easy access to YMCA childcare, Newbury Primary, Mount Ridley College & Hume Anglican Grammar.
Insights: 31 Kelway Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
